title: Maharashtra: 51-year-old man duped of Rs 4 lakh on promise of foreign currency exchange in Dombivli
description:
The victim, a wholesale medicine supplier, contacted the accused through an acquaintance and they offered to give him 700 Dinars in exchange of Rs 12 lakh, the police said

The police said that the victim, a wholesale medicine supplier, contacted the accused through an acquaintance and they offered ...
